Client.Name: eyeoncloud
Client.Website: 江西云眼视界科技股份有限公司- (eyeoncloud.cn)

Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Jiangxi CloudEye Vision Technology Co., Ltd. was established in 2017 as a high-tech enterprise dedicated to providing innovative products, solutions, and business models for urban digital transformation, striving to become a leading domestic provider of digital city data intelligence products and operation services. The company integrates technologies such as the Internet of Things (IoT), artificial intelligence (AI), cloud computing, and big data, and has pioneered the launch of its "One Foundation, Two Wings" product system domestically.

The "One Foundation" refers to the City Video Data Platform, which possesses capabilities for the access, transmission, storage, AI processing, and big data analysis of IoT data centered around video. The "Two Wings" encompass:

1. One wing focuses on urban macro-governance, offering cost-effective AIoT products and services for domains including public safety, comprehensive governance, environmental protection, and water conservancy in cities. These offerings include management of key individuals, event early warning systems, and environmental monitoring solutions.
2. The other wing is oriented towards urban grassroots governance, delivering high-quality audiovisual collaboration services for areas such as community management, beautiful countryside initiatives, grassroots mediation, and convenient, people-oriented services.

Currently, the company employs over 100 R&D personnel. Research and development centers have been established in Nanchang, Wuhan, and Shenzhen, with technical staff accounting for more than 70% of the workforce. Core products have achieved coverage across all 11 prefecture-level cities and over 80 counties in Jiangxi Province, with successful implementations also in Anhui, Hainan, and Guangdong provinces.
